name: Black Hole Suitcase
description:
Submission for Quarantine Jam 2020 (theme was Pack). My first jam running solo.

I made a simple game about your sentient suitcase that is helping you pack by sucking up everything in your room. This is the only way to do it when you wait to the last minute to pack!

Use the mouse to make sure you only pack essential items by deflecting garbage away from your suitcase!
